guides.name: Ruby
guides.experience: 20 Years of Experience on the Water
guides.description: Ruby has grown up rafting and it is her biggest passion. Outside of being a River Guide, she has 2 dogs and loves spending her time outdoors.

guides.name: Cody
guides.experience: 15 Years of Experience on the Water
guides.description: Cody spends all of his free days on the water. He says nothing is more peaceful than kayaking down a beautiful river.

guides.name: Frankie
guides.experience: 17 Years of Experience on the Water
guides.description: Frankie has been fishing and spending time on the water since he was a young boy. Outside of being a River Guide, he is a professional fisherman for his career.

guides.name: Wayne
guides.experience: 20 Years of Experience on the Water
guides.description: Wayne says, if you love what you do, you'll never work a day in your life. He does exactly that. Every single day, Wayne is on the water! He has mastered any type of water transportation and has a passion for showing others his ways.
